description: [Fresh Class A seasoned and basted whole chicken. Without giblets., Why wait until the weekend for a roast? Serve this extra tasty family favourite with traditional trimmings and try our five star rated Real Food recipe Sticky Chantenay carrots and parsnips. Click on the Recipes tab at the top of this webpage to see our Real Food chicken recipes with ingredients you can add straight to your basket.  Our Tesco chicken is sourced solely from British supplying farms which meet the Red Tractor standards along with our own strict Livestock Codes of Practice. These chickens, are reared in houses with windows that provide natural daylight. In addition, they are also provided with environmental benefits such as bales and perches.
